title.rendered: MGM RESORTS GOES FULL THROTTLE FOR FORMULA 1 HEINEKEN SILVER LAS VEGAS GRAND PRIX

content.rendered:
Pop-Up Experiences, Exclusive Culinary Events, Thrilling Activations Debut for Race Weekend

Click here for the full lineup, more information and to book reservations. Follow @MGMResortsIntl for updates.

LAS VEGAS, Oct. 19, 2023 /PRNewswire/ — MGM Resorts International (NYSE: MGM) is putting the pedal to the metal for the FORMULA 1 HEINEKEN SILVER LAS VEGAS GRAND PRIX weekend November 16-18, creating exclusive events, one-of-a-kind activations, artist engagements and more that will take over The Strip throughout race week.



Originally published at https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/mgm-resorts-goes-full-throttle-for-formula-1-heineken-silver-las-vegas-grand-prix-301962112.html
Images courtesy of https://pixabay.com
